AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing SVUtil, which is a tool for helping with certain things in Stardew Valley.
[p]help SVUtil to see commands. No additional requirements.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: SVUtil
SHORT: Helper cog for certain aspects of Stardew Valley
DESCRIPTION: Helps with Stardew Valley in game events like the luau and the fair
